text: "And I Love Her" is a 1964 song by The Beatles. It was taken from their third studio album A Hard Day's Night. It went to number 12 in the United States and number 14 in Belgium. It has been covered by Esther Phillips, Cliff Richard and Kurt Cobain. title: And I Love Her
